snippet.title: Beyond Good & Evil HD: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare to return to the fight for freedom in Beyond Good & Evil HD. Check out the launch trailer for the remake of the classic platforming adventure game.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
